variations.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Burning to them for 10s. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 210% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Burning to them for 10s. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Burning to them for 10s. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Burning to them for 10s. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Burning to them for 10s. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies. Each stack of Burning on the target deals extra damage equal to 48% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies. Each stack of Burning on the target deals extra damage equal to 56% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies. Each stack of Burning on the target deals extra damage equal to 64% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies. Each stack of Burning on the target deals extra damage equal to 72% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies. Each stack of Burning on the target deals extra damage equal to 80% of ATK.
Increases ATK by 12.5% during the first 30 seconds of combat.
Increases ATK by 25% during the first 30 seconds of combat.
